name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BirdTab - Discover Bird Pictures & Songs in New Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Chrome new tab with beautiful bird photos and soothing sounds. Enjoy a refreshing bird background every time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing BirdTab: Your Daily Dose of Avian Wonder!

🦜 NEW TAB, NEW BIRD: Every time you open a new tab, be greeted by a breathtaking photograph of a different bird species. It's like having a window to the avian world right in your browser!

🌎 GLOBAL BIRDING ADVENTURE: Explore birds from various regions around the world. From the exotic toucans of South America to the majestic eagles of North America, BirdTab brings global biodiversity to your fingertips.

📚 LEARN AS YOU BROWSE: Each tab provides interesting facts about the featured bird. Expand your knowledge effortlessly while you go about your daily browsing.

🎵 CHIRP ALONG: Listen to authentic bird calls and songs, bringing the sounds of nature right to your desktop.

📸 STUNNING IMAGERY: All photographs are high-quality images from respected wildlife photographers, showcasing birds in their natural habitats.

🔍 EBIRD INTEGRATION: Powered by eBird, the world's largest biodiversity-related citizen science project, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information.

🎨 SLEEK DESIGN: A clean, unobtrusive interface that enhances your browsing experience without getting in the way.

🔄 DAILY UPDATES: A new set of birds each day keeps your browsing fresh and exciting.

🌐 WORKS OFFLINE: Once loaded, enjoy your daily birds even without an internet connection.

🔒 PRIVACY FOCUSED: We respect your privacy. BirdTab doesn't collect any personal data.

Whether you're a seasoned birder, a nature enthusiast, or simply someone who appreciates beauty, BirdTab offers a moment of wonder and learning with every new tab. Transform your browsing routine into an educational journey through the fascinating world of birds.

Install BirdTab now and let your curiosity take flight! 🐦✨

Key Features

1. Daily bird photos from around the world
2. Fascinating bird facts and information
3. Authentic bird calls and songs
4. Powered by eBird for accurate data
5. Works offline once loaded
6. Privacy-focused with no data collection

Version 1.2.6 - Fix visual styles for photographer and recordist
Version 1.2.5 - adds uninstall survey
Version 1.2.4 - enable / disable quiet hours.
